H3.text: what town did justin bieber grew up in. London

A4.text: Justin Drew Bieber was born on March 1, 1994, at St. Joseph's Hospital in London, Ontario, and was raised in Stratford.

A5.text: In 2018, 'Steps to Stardom', an exhibit on Bieber's early career, opened in his hometown of Stratford, Ontario.
